metadata.Title: CVE-2021-32273 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in faad2 through 2.10.0. A stack-buffer-overflow exists in the function ftypin located in mp4read.c. It allows an attacker to cause Code Execution.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-32273` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

faad - 2.10.1-1
libfaad2 - 2.10.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: faad2 package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.10.1-1').
welle.io package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
